Translations.Text: Tin segkwent i iunzen i Oebbi, akked Umazan iS, u txeddem ayen ilhan, ad as Nefk arraz berdayen, u Nhegga yas d l$it ukyis
A tilawin n Nnbi! Ur tellimt am tlawin nniven. Ma teezzbemt, ur teppeccvemt deg wawal, a kwent isirem umuvin n wul. Inimt awal uwqim

Ilimt deg ixxamen nnkwent. Ur pcebbieemt acebbee n at war tussna imenza. eEealemt, zekkimt, oavimt Oebbi akked Umazan iS. Ib$a kan Oebbi a kwent ipwakkes nnkel, a tawacult n Uxxam. U, a kwent Izzizdeg nezzeh
Mmektitemt ed ayen i kwent $oan, deg ixxamen nnkwent, n issekniyen n Oebbi, akw n uuwab. Ih, Oebbi Izga d Laiif, Ippuxebbeo

Ih, imvuaen, timvuain, lmumnin argaz tameiiut, itubiyen, titubiyin, wid akked tid issawalen tidep, iueboiyen, tiueboiyin, wid akked tid ippagwaden, wid akked tid ipseddiqen, wid akked tid ippueumen, wid akked tid ipearaben $ef tuzzuft nnsen, wid akked tid id immektayen aias Oebbi; i wigi, Ihegga d Oebbi ssmae akked warraz abarar
Ur issefk ara i win, ne$ tin iumnen, ad smenyafen lameo nnsen, ma Iseyya d lameo Oebbi, akked Umazan iS. Win inuqmen Oebbi, akked Umazan iS, ni$ innetlaf ttelfan n uuee

Mi tenniv i win I$at Oebbi, u t$atev: "jmaa $uoek, tameiiut ik, eezzeb i Oebbi"; teffrev deg iman ik, ayen ara d Isban Oebbi. Tugadev medden. D Oebbi, i iwatan a T tagwadev. Mi s ibra Zayed, Njewo ik yides, iwakken ur teppili lhejna i lmumnin, ma u$en tilawin n wid id ssekren, mara ad sent brun. Ad iuao lameo n Oebbi
Ur telli lhejna f Nnbi, deg wayen Ieeppem fellas Oebbi; d tannumi n Oebbi $ef imezwura. Lameo n Oebbi izga ipwafta
Wid issawaven tiboatin n Oebbi, i T ippagwaden, ur ppagwaden yiwen, siwa Oebbi. Oebbi Iqadd i uqeiii
Ur illi Mueemmed d ababat n yiwen seg irgazen nnwen, maca, d Amazan n Oebbi, u d aneggaru n lambiyya. Oebbi Izga Issen yal cci
A wid iumnen! Mmektit ed Oebbi, macci d izli
Sbuccuaet eP, uubee, tameddit
D Neppa i d Inuben fellawen, akked lmalayek, iwakken a kwen Issuffe$ si tillas ar tafat. Izga Ipeunu $ef lmumnin
Asmi ara T magren, azul nnsen d: "tifrat"! Ihegga yasen d arraz ukyis
A Nnbi! Nuzen ik id d anagi, d abcir u d aneddao
i ineccden ar Oebbi, s tsrie iS; d asavef icaalen
Becceo lmumnin s lfevl ameqwoan i nitni, s$uo Oebbi
Ur ppa$ awal i ijehliyen akked ixabiten. Ur ssemeas, i ccum nnsen. Ppkel $ef Oebbi, Iqadd Oebbi d Awkil
A wid iumnen! Ma tu$em tid iumnen, sinna, tebram asent, uqbel ma tennulem tent, ur fellawen ad asent teesbem tallit. £itet pent, serreet asent, s wudem uwqim

A Nnbi! Neell ak tilawin iwumi tefkiv tiqviaen nnsent, tiklatin ik, si tid i k Iqsed Oebbi, iss is n aam ik, tid n taamtin ik, tid n xal ik, tid n txaltin ik iunagen yidek, tameiiut iumnen, ma tefka iman is i Nnbi, ma ib$a Nnbi a p ya$. D lemziyya i kecc, war lmumnin. Ni$ Neeoa acu i sen Nseyya af tlawin nnsen, akked teklatin nnsen. Iwakken ur teppili fellak lhejna. Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu

A ppesganiv tin i k ihwan segsent. A d tawiv $uoek tin i k ihwan, ne$ tin teb$iv si tid taazlev. Ur fellak tuzzma. Akka i iwulem, iwakken ad qenaant, ur $webbnent, ad oavint akw, ayen i sent tefkiv. Oebbi Ieoa i illan deg ulawen nnwen. Oebbi Izga d Amusnaw, Ieellem
Ur ak eellent tlawin, sya d asawen, ne$ abeddel n tlawin, xas taaoeb ik uuifa nnsent, siwa tiklatin ik. Oebbi Izga Issikid yal cci

A wid iumnen! Ur keccmet ar texxamin n Nnbi, ar awen iaammed, d inebgawen ar wucci, ur teggunim. Maca, ma tepwaaovem, kecmet. Mi teccam, sahlet; ur ssioxiset ameslay. Ayagi, s tidep, iqelleq Nnbi. Isetea segwen. Oebbi ur Ipsetei $ef tidep. Ma tessutrem asent ta$awsa, ssutret ep deffir tsabert. Yif it wakka, i tezdeg n wulawen nnwen, akked wulawen nnsent. Ur awen ilaq ara a pjjerim Amazan n Oebbi, ne$ a ppa$em tilawin is, deffir es, d awez$i. Ayagi, ad yili, ar Oebbi, d lefviea
Ama tessknem d leaoa, ne$ teffrem p, Oebbi, s tidep, Ieoa yal cci

Ur telli tiyta degsent af ibabaten nnsent, arraw nnsent, atmaten nnsent, arraw n wamaten nnsent, arraw n tsetmatin nnsent, tilawin nnsent, ticrikin nnsent. Ad eezzbent i Oebbi. Oebbi, s tidep, d Anagi n yal cci
Oebbi akked lmalayek iS, s tidep, Nuban $ef Nnbi. A wid iumnen! Nubet fellas, ternum as azul aemayan
Ih, wid ijjerin Oebbi akked Umazan iS, Ixza ten Oebbi, di ddunit, di laxeot. Ihegga yasen d aaaqeb isdullun
Wid ijjerin lmumnin, argaz tameiiut, $ef wayen ur ksiben, ni$ bbwin acehrir akked ubekkav n uuee
A Nnbi! Ini i tlawin ik, i iss ik, i tlawin n lmumnin, ad jemaant ijufao nnsent. Ppif akka, a tent aaqlen, ur tent pooerin. Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ma ur ebisen ara ixabiten, imehzulen n wul, akked wid ipxeooiven di Lmadina, ad ak Nebges $uosen. Sinna, siwa cwii n tallit ara yilin, degs, d loiran ik
Ad pwaxzun anda ten nufan, ad pwaiifen, ad pwan$en akw
D tannumi n Oebbi ar wid iaaddan zik. Ur teppafev, d awez$i, abeddel, di tannumi n Oebbi
Steqsan k imdanen, af yimir. Ini: "it Issnen siwa Oebbi". Anwa ad ak imlen, amar imir iqeob ed
Oebbi, s tidep, Ixza ijehliyen, Ihegga yasen d u$ud
Ad wekkoen degs, i lebda; ur ppafen bab, ne$ asettao
Ass ideg ara zzin wudmawen nnsen, ar tmes, ad inin: "a yamxix nne$! A lemmer nunez i Oebbi, u nunez i Umazan
Ad inin: "a Mass nne$! Nekwni nunez i igeldan nne$, i imeqwoanen nne$, telfen a$ ar yir abrid
A Mass nne$! Aaqeb iten berdayen, u Xzu ten s leqsee
A wid iumnen! Ur ppilit am wid i ijjerin Musa. Izekka t Oebbi, seg wayen id nnan. Illa ar Oebbi d amxallef
A wid iumnen! Eezzbet i Oebbi, tinim awal umain
Ad awen Iueggem igiten nnwen, ad Isemmee ibekkaven nnwen. Win iouvan Oebbi akked Umazan iS, ni$ ibbwi arraz ameqwoaean
Naaoev a nefk lamana i igenwan, i tmurt, i idurar. Ugin a p iifen. Ugaden p. Ibubb ip umdan. Neppa ard amednus ur nessin
Ihi, ad Isaaddi Oebbi aaaqeb af ixabiten akked txabitin, wid akked tid ipcaraken. Ad Issuref Oebbi i wid akked tid iumnen. Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ccekoan i Oebbi, i iIan i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. I Neppa, ccekoan di laxert. Neppa, d Bab n uuwab, Ippuxebbeo
Ieoa ayen ikeccmen di tmurt, ayen id iteff$en segs, ayen id iprusun seg igenni, ayen ippalin $uoes. Neppa Ipeunu, Ipsemmie

Nnan wid ijehlen: "ur a$ d ippas yimir". Ini: "xaii, s Mass iw, ara kwen id ias"! Amusnaw n tbavnit, ur idrig fellaS ubruy ubelkim, ama deg igenwan, ama di ddunit; ama seddaw wannect is, ama sennig es; akw, di Tezmamt ipbegginen
Ad Ikafi wid iumnen, ixedmen ayen ilhan. I wigi, ssmae akked ooeeq ukyis
Wid ikkaten deg issekniyen nne£, sfunnugen, widak, fellasen aaaqeb n twa$it taqeoeant
Wid iwumi teppunefk tmusni, walan ar ayen id irsen $uoek, s$uo Mass ik, d tidep. Ippawi s abrid n Uzmir, Amaazuz
Nnan wid ijehlen: "day ad awen nessken argaz, ar awen d yinin ar ma teftutsem, yal aftutes, i kunwi lxelq amaynut
Iger ed tikerkas $ef Oebbi, ne$ d aoehbani"? Xaii, wid ur numin ara s laxeot, haaten deg uaaqeb, akked ttelfan u$miq

Day ur walan ara ayen illan zdat sen, u deffir sen, di tmurt akked igenwan? Ma ihwa ya£, a ten Nger seddaw tmurt, ne$ a d Nesse$li fellasen igezzim seg igenni. Deg wayagi, ih, d assekni i yal amdan ucaif
Ni$ Nefka s$uone£ lfevl i Dawed. A yidurar, alset yides akked ifrax. Nerra yas uzzal d aleqqaq
Eunaa tibedaiyin n wuzzal, qiss tindar. Xeddmet ayen ilhan. Nek, Pwali$ ayen txeddmem
I Sliman: avu. Win n uubee, aggur; win n tmeddit, aggur. Nelli yas taawint n nneas. Kra n leonun ad xedmen fellas, s tsrie n Mass is. Win degsen, iveofen i lameo nne£, Nessukk fellas, aaaqeb ujajie
Xeddmen as ayen ib$a: leowamaa, tiaancuoin, loefnat am ievunen, ticcuytin iqaaden. Exdem s tnemmirt, a tawacult n Dawed, drus n yimdanen iW i isnemmiren
Mi Nseyya fellas tameppant, ur as faqen ara immut, armi icca taakwazt is, ubaaauc n wakal. Mi i$li, eulfan leonun ar, lemmer day ssinen tabavnit, ur qqimen deg uaaqeb isdullun
Ni$, i Saba, assekni di tnezdu$in nnsen. Snat tebeirin, ta yeffus, ta zelmev. Eccet si l$it n Mass nnwen, u snemmret aS. Tamurt ilhan, Mass Ipsemmieen
Wexxoen. Nuzen asen aeemmal n Aarim. Tibeirin nnsen, nerra tent d tibeirin id ippaken l$ella oeagen, tammemayt, akked tzegwart taxeiiayt
Akka ay ten Nqeiii $ef tijehli nnsen. Day a Nqeiii wur nejhil
Nerra garasen u ger temdinin i$ef Nburek, timdinin id ivehoen. Nektal tikli garasent: "mereet degsent di laman, am yiv, am ass
Nnan: "a Mass nne$! Zzi$wzef tallit ger zziaoat nne$"! Densen iman nnsen. Nerra ten d tiquivin. Nesqucc iten wakali. Ih, deg wayagi, war ccek, d issekniyen i yal aueboi isnemmiren
Ni$ Iblis itebbet ed, segsen, ameyyez is. Vefoen t, siwa arbaa si lmumnin
Ur isai kra udabu fellasen. Iwakken kan, a Nissin anwa iumnen s laxeot, u anwa i illan, fellas, di ccekk. Mass ik Ipearab af yal cci
Ini: "naaret wid i tepkabarem, war Oebbi. Ur sain taeeyt ubelkim, deg igenwan ne$ di tmurt; ur criken degsen; ur aS illi, garasen, umaiwen
Cafuaa, s$uoeS, tenfaa kan win iwumi ip Irad. Alamma, ma tekkes tugdi seg wulawen nnsen, a d inin: "acu id Inna, Mass nnwen"? A d inin: "d tidep, u Neppa d Aalayen, d Ameqwoan
Ini: "anwa ikwen ip$aten, si tmurt akked igenwan"? Ini: "d Oebbi". Nekwni am kunwi, amendeo ma nella di nnhaya, ne$ di ttelfan n uuee
Ini: "ur teppuqeiiim $ef wayen nfalia, ur neppuqeiii $ef wayen txeddmem
Ini: "ad a$ Issemlil Mass nne$, sinna, ad Ieudd garane$, s tidep. Neppa d Ameaddi Amusnaw
Ini: "sseknet iyi d wid i tqeonem $uoeS, d icriken"! Xaii, Neppa d Oebbi Uzmir, Bab n uuwab
Ur k id Nuzen, i imdanen, armi d uqnia; a pbecooev, a pnedoev. Maca, tegwti n yimdanen, ur ssinen
Qqaoen: "melmi lemaahda agi, ma tessawalem tidep
Ini: "$uowen ppaaud ass, ur tezmirem a t teswexxoem, ne$ a t id tesqeobem, s saaa

Nnan wid ijehlen: "ur neppamen, d awez$i, s Leqwoan agi, ne$ s wayen it id izwaren". Lemmer a pwaliv mara bedden imednas, ar Mass nnsen, pmeslayen garasen. Ad inin uohifen i imzuxiyen: "lemmer macci d kunwi, yili nella d lmumnin
Ad inin imzuxiyen i uohifen: "day d nekwni ikwen isfeo$en af nnhaya, mi kwen id iusa? Xaii, tellam d ibe$wviyen

Ad inin uohifen, i imzuxiyen: "xaii! Nncub, iv akked wass, mi teeppmem, fellane$, a nagwi Oebbi, u ad aS negg tanudda". Ffren nndama mi walan aaaqeb. Nerra tiqwlavin $ef imegoav n wid ijehlen. Day ara ppuqeiiin $ef wayen ur xdimen
Ur Nuzen ara kra uneddao ar temdint, mebla ma nnan imeokantiyen is: "nekwni, ih, nugwi ayen is id teppuceggaam
Nnan: "nekwni, n$elb ik ayla, tarwa. Ur nelli d wid ara ippuqeiiin
Ini: "ihi Mass iw Ip$iti win i S ihwan u Iwezzen; maca, tegwti n imdanen, ur ssinen
Macci d ayla nnwen, ne$ d tarwa nnwen, ara kwen id ieeieen nezzeh $uone£, siwa wid iumnen, ixedmen ayen ilhan. I nitni arraz berdayen, ilmend n wayen xedmen. Ad ilin, di laman, di t$uofatin
Ma d wid ikkaten deg issekniyen nne£, sfunnugen, widak a d rsen i uaaqeb
Ini: "ih, Mass iw Ip$iti win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS. Iwezzen as. Ayen akw ara tefkem n cci, ad awen t id Irr. Neppa, Yif akw im$iten
Ass ideg ara ten Ifser, akken ma llan, imiren ad Yini i lmalayek: "wigi, day llan aabden kwent
A d inint: "gedha s yiseK! D Kecc ay d Bab nne$, war nitni. Xaii, llan aabden leonun. Tegwti degsen umnen yissen
Assa, ur imlik yiwen i wayev, segwen, aba$uo ne$ ccqa. A Nini i wid idensen: "jeoobet aaaqeb n tmes, i tellam tnekoem t

Ma $oan asen issekniyen nne£ ipbegginen, ad inin: "wagi d argaz kan, i ib$an a kwen istixeo, seg wayen llan aabden imezwura nnwen". Ad inin: "ayagi, siwa d tikerkas id innulfan". Wid ijehlen i tidep, mi ten id tusa, ad inin: "ayagi d sseur n uuee kan
Ur asen Nefki tizmamin, ara lemden; ur asen d Nuzen, uqbel ik, aneddao
Skaddben wid i ten id izwaren. Ur asen tebbwiv ara tis mraw n wayen i ippunefken mi skaddben imazanen iW. A tuzzma W, imiren
Ini: "ar yiwet kan, ara kwen nabi$: a pbeddem zdat Oebbi, di sin, ne$ weeeedwen; sinna, a d tesmektim. Ameddakwel nnwen ur illi d aoehbani. Neppa d aneddao nnwen kan, uqbel aaaqeb uqsie
Ini: "ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat; apan nnwen. Ih, taqdiat iw, ar Oebbi kan. Neppa, $ef yal cci, d Anagi
Ini: "ih, Mass iw Ipqeddim tidep, d Amusnaw n tbavnit
Ini: "tusa d tidep, ur d nezzunt tkerkas, ur d ppalsent
Ini: "ma nnetlafe$, nnetlafe$ kan i iman iw. Ma pwanha$, d ayen iyi d Iweeea Mass iw. Neppa, ih, d Aqoib, Isell
Lemmer a pwaliv mi xelaan, tarewla ur telli. Pwaiifen, si tama iqeoben
Nnan: "numen yis". Amek ara d ssiwven, si tama ibaaden
Ni$ llan zik, nekoen t. Rran akin tabavnit, si tama ibaaden
Ad yili ufuil, garasen d wayen ctaqen, akken tevoa, zik, d wid i ten icban. Ih, nitni llan di ccekk imcebbwel
Ccekoan i Oebbi, Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan, i Irran lmalayek d timersulin sut sin, krav, akked kue iferrawen. Irennu, di lxelq, ayen i S ihwan. Oebbi, s tidep, Izmer i yal cci
Ayen Ifka Oebbi ueunu, i medden, ur t itekkes yiwen. Ayen Iiief, ur izmir yiwen a t id iazen, deffir eS. Neppa d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
A yimdanen! Mmektit ed a$iti nnwen s$uo Oebbi. Day illa uxellaq, war Oebbi, ikwen ioeeqen seg igenni akked tmurt? Ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa, ihi acimi tessaawajem
Ma nekoen k, ni$ pwanekoen imazanen, uqbel ik. Ar Oebbi, ara qqlen lumuo
A yimdanen! Ih, lemaahda n Oebbi d tidep. Ur kwen tep$uoou tmeddurt n ddunit! Ur kwen ipkellix um$weooi, af Oebbi
Cciian, s tidep, d acengu nnwen. Eesbet ep d acengu. Issawal kan, i ukabar is, ad ilin seg wat tmes
I wid ijehlen, aaaqeb uqsie. I wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ssmae akked warraz meqqwoen
Day win iwumi Icebbee yir igiten is, iwakken ad ioaal gerzen…? S tidep, Oebbi Itellif win i S ihwan, Inehhu win i S ihwan. Ur hellek ara iman ik, fellasen. Ih, Oebbi Ieoa acu la uuenaen
Oebbi i Ippaznen avu, issalayen asigna. Neppawi t ar tmurt immuten, Nessidir ed, yis, akal, deffir tmeppant is. Akka, tanekra
Win ib$an tazmert, tazmert akw ar Oebbi. Awal ukyis ippali $uoeS. Igi ilhan, Iteg as ccan. Aaaqeb uqsie i wid ippandin tucmitin. A ppemeu tandit nnsen

Ixelq ikwen Oebbi seg wakal; sinna, si tiqqit; sinna, Irra kwen d tiyugiwin. Ur treffed tadist, ur tepparew nnta, siwa ma Ieoa t. Ur Izzi$wzif laameo i umuddir, ur as t Issenqas, siwa ma di tezmamt. Ayagi, ih, d ayen isehlen i Oebbi

Ur aadilen sin ilellen: wa zeddig, eid, iwata i tissit; wayev d ameo$an, d aoeagan. Segsen teppeppem aksum aleqqaq, teppekksem d iaqqucen i teppeqnem. Twalav sfina tepcerrig iten, iwakken a pnadim lfevl iS. Amar a ppesnemmrem
Issekcam iv deg wass, Issekcam ass deg yiv. Ieeppem i yiiij akked waggur, ad leun ar lajel ipwassnen. D wagi ay d Oebbi, Mass nnwen. IneS tagelda. Wid i tnaaoem, war Neppa, ur rebeen iclem utemoiw
Ma tnaaoem ten, ur sellen i tnaaoit nnwen. Xas slan, ur awen d pparan. Ass n tnekra, ad nekoen ccerk nnwen. Ur k ipxebbio yiwen am Win Ippuxebboen
A yimdanen! Kunwi d ime$ban zdat Oebbi. Oebbi d Asaay, d Amaazuz
Ma ihwa yaS, a kwen Ikkes, a d Iawi lxelq amaynut
I Oebbi, ayagi, ur illi d aeayan

Win ibubben ur ipbibbi taakkwemt n wayev. Ma isuter ed afus win iaabban, ur s ipwakkas wacemma, xas ma si llezm is. Nabi kan wid ippagwaden Mass nnsen di tbavnit, u peallan. Win ipzekkin, i iman is kan i ipzekki. Tu$alin ar Oebbi
Ur iaadil uder$al akked win ipwalin
ne$ tillas akked tafat
ne$ tili akked una$uo
Ur aadilen imuddiren akked lmeggtin. Oebbi, s tidep, Issel i win i S ihwan. Kecc, ur tezmirev a ppeslev i wid illan di tneilin
Kecc, d aneddao kan
Ih, Nuzen ik id, s tidep, d abeccao, d aneddao. Ur illi lois, mebla ma iusa t id uneddao
Ma skaddben k, ni$ skaddben wid i ten id izwaren. Usan ten id imazanen nnsen, s ubeggen, s Ihellilen, s Tezmamt timnewweot
D$a Ssemealqe$ i wid ijehlen. Amek tuzzma W imiren
Ur twalav ara Oebbi Isse$li d aman seg igenni? Nessuffe$ ed, yissen, ppemoa n yal ini. Deg idurar, isoiden icebeanen, izegwa$en n yal ini, akked iberkanen mavi
Imdanen, leweuc, lmal, n yal ini ula d nitni. Akka, ger imdanen iS, d imusnawen kan i ippagwaden Oebbi. Ih, Oebbi d Uzmir, Ipsemmie
Ih, wid iqqaoen Tazmamt n Oebbi, ipeallan, ipseddiqen seg wayen iten N$at, s tuffra ne$ ainani, ad ssirmen ttjaoa ur nepquccu
Akken ad asen Ifk tiqvaain nnsen, ad asen Irnu si lfevl iS. Neppa, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ippara tajmilt
Ayen i k Nweeea, si Tezmamt, d tidep id itebbten ayen ip id izwaren. Ih, Oebbi, $ef imdanen iS, Ippuxebbeo, Ipwali ten
Sinna, Nerra d iweooaten n Tezmamt, wid Nefren, ger imdanen nne£. Garasen, llan win idensen iman is, garasen alemmas, garasen win izeggwiren ar lxio, s wannuf n Oebbi. Wagi d lfevl ameqwoan
Loennet n Aaden, ara kecmen. Din, ad qqnen imeqyasen n ddheb, akked tyuqat. Leerir, di lebsa nnsen
Ad inin: "cekoan i Oebbi i Issaferen fella$ le$wben. Ih, Mass nne$ Ipsemmie, Ippara tajmilt
I a$ Irran, s lefvl iS, axxam i tnezdu$t; ur a$ ipnal, degs, wugur; ur a$ ipnal, degs, aaggu
I wid ijehlen, times n Loahennama. Ur tepfukku fellasen, ad mmten; ur ippifsus, fellasen, uaaqeb is. Akka, ay Nepqeiii yal ajehli

Degs, ad ppu$un: "a Mass nne$! Ssuffe$ ane$, a nexdem ayen ilhan, macci am akken nella nxeddem"! Day ur awen Nesse$wzef ara laameo, akken a d immekti win id ismektayen? Iusa kwen id uneddao. Ihi jeoobet. I imednas, ur illi umaiwen
Oebbi Issen tabavnit n tmurt akked igenwan. Neppa, s tidep, Ieoa i illan deg idmaren
D Neppa i kwen Iran d igensas di tmurt. Win ijehlen, tijehli s mgal iman is. Tijehli ijehliyen, siwa a$unzu i trennu ar Mass nnsen. Tijehli ijehliyen, siwa taxessaot i trennu

Ini: "twalam icriken nnwen, la tnaaoem, war Oebbi; sseknet iyi d acu xelqen, si tmurt, ne$ ma saan amur deg igenwan, ne$ ma Nefka yasen Tazmamt i sen d ipbegginen? Xaii, aaahed imednas, garasen, d a$uoou kan
D Oebbi, s tidep, i Iifen tamurt akked igenwan, ur $ellin ara. Lemmer ad $lin, ur illi yiwen, deffir eS, ara ten iiifen. Neppa, ih, Izga Ieellem, Ipsemmie
Gullen s Oebbi, tagalit meqwoen, ar ma iusa ten id uneddao, ar ad ddun d ubrid, sennig akw leoyus. Mi ten id iusa uneddao, i asen d irna, siwa tugin

tem$weo di tmurt, akked tnaauot tucmip. Ur teppaiiaf tnaauot tucmip, siwa bab is. Day ur muqlen ara ar tannumi imezwura? Ur teppafev, d awez$i, abeddel di tannumi n Oebbi. Ur teppafev ara adewwel di tannumi n Oebbi

Day ur unagen ara di tmurt, ad walin amek tevoa d wid i ten id izwaren? Llan $elben ten tazmert. Ur illi win ara sfunngen Oebbi, s wacemma, deg igenwan, ne$ di tmurt. Neppa, ih, Izga d Amusnaw, d Uzmir
Lemmer Ipqeiii Oebbi imdanen, $ef wayen kesben, ur Ippaooa kra n lxelq sufella n tmurt. Maca, Iswexxio iten, ar lajel ipwassnen. Ma iusa d lajel nnsen, ihi, Oebbi, deg imdanen iS, Izga Ipwali
Is
S Leqwoan uuwib
Kecc, d uuee, ar seg imazanen
ef ubrid uwqim
Tarusi n Uzmir Ipeunun
iwakken a pnedoev agdud; ur pwanedoen imezwura nnsen, d$a stehzan
Ni$ iuao wawal, $ef tegwti degsen, d$a ur uminen
Ih, Nurez iten si tmegoav ar tmira, d$a ndellen, ur iiinizen
Nerra aedid zdat sen, aedid deffir sen. Nesbur asen, ihi ur pwalin
Iauva fellasen: ama tnubav ten, ne$ ur ten tnubav; ur ppamnen
Nabi kan wid iiiafaoen asmekti, ippagwaden Aenin, di tbavnit. Ihi, becceo it s ssmae, akked warraz ukyis
Ih, Nekwni Nessidir lmeggtin. Nepparu ayen xeddmen akked lateo nnsen. Neeseb yal cci di Tezmamt ipbegginen
Awi asen d amedya: at temdint, mi ten id usan imazanen
Mi sen Nuzen sin, nekoen ten. Null s wis krav. Nnan: "nekwni d imazanen $uowen
Nnan: "kunwi d imdanen kan, am nekwni. Aenin ur d Issers acemma. Kunwi, teskiddibem kan
Nnan: "Mass nne$ Ieoa, s tidep, ar $uowen id neppuceggaa
Ay fella$ kan d timenna ipbegginen
Nnan: "war ccekk, tesskeesem a$. Ma ur teebisem ara, a kwen neooem, u a nessuk fellawen, aaaqeb aqeoean
Nnan: "lkees nnwen yidwen. Day imi i kwen smektin? Maca, kunwi d agdud amaafun
Iusa d si ieof ibaaden n temdint, urgaz s tazzla. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Ddut d imazanen
Ddut d wid ur awen d nessuter taqviat, nitni pwanhan
Amek ur aabde$ ara Win iyi d Ixelqen, u $uoeS tu$alin nnwen
Day ad sau$, war Neppa, ioebbiten? Ur iyi d teppawi acemma cafuaa nnsen, ma Irad iyi Uenin ccqa; ur iyi pselliken
Yili nek, war ccekk, di ttelfan n uuee
Nek, umne$ s Mass nnwen. Ihi selt iyi d
Nnan as: "ekcem ar Loennet"! Inna: "anna$, a lemmer ad ieeo ugdud iw
amek iyi Isemmee Mass iw, u Irra yi seg imaazuzen
